column6: "RISING STORM" Conclusion! This is it! The Galactus epic concludes--but where will that leave the FF?  Who will live, who will die, and how will Johnny Storm ever be the same now that he's tasted the Power Cosmic? The answer will surprise you! Part 4 (of 4).
column8: | inker:Karl Kesel | colorist:Paul Mounts | writer:Mark Waid | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo | letterer:Rus Wooton
